label: Renato - IIoT Project by Renato Gomes

name: Logo / Clock
format:
<script id="clockScript1" type="text/javascript">
    var clockInterval;
    $(function () {
        if (clockInterval) return;

   
        
        //add logo
        var div3 = $('<div/>');
        var logo2 = new Image();

        logo2.src = 'https://balluffbrasil.com.br/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/balluff.jpg'
        logo2.height = 68;
        div3[0].style.margin = '10px auto';

        div3.append(logo2);

        //add clock
        var div2 = $('<div/>');
        var p = $('<p/>');

        div2.append(p);
        div2[0].style.margin = '5px';

        function displayTime() {
            p.text(new Date().toLocaleString());
        }
        
        clockInterval = setInterval(displayTime, 1000);

        //add to toolbar when it's available
        var addToToolbarTimer;
        
        function addToToolbar() {
            var toolbar = $('.md-toolbar-tools');
            
            if(!toolbar.length) return;
            
            toolbar.append(div3);
            toolbar.append(div2);
            clearInterval(addToToolbarTimer);
        }
        addToToolbarTimer = setInterval(addToToolbar, 100);
    });
</script>

name: Open a popup window w/ a clickable link
Insert a link to a group on dashboard
Show / hide groups according to the function
Clock Toolbar
format:
<script id="titleScript" type="text/javascript">
    $('#clock').remove();
    var toolbar = $('.md-toolbar-tools');
    var div = $('<div/>');
    var p = $('<p/ id="clock">');
    
    $('#titleScript').parent().hide();
    div.append(p);
    div[0].style.margin = '5px 5px 5px auto';
    toolbar.append(div);

    function displayTitle(lh) {
        p.text(lh); 
    }
    
    function upTime() {
        var d = new Date();
        p.text(d.toLocaleTimeString('de-AT'));
    }

    

    // Watch the payload and update the title
    (function(scope) {
        scope.$watch('msg.payload', function(data) {
            displayTitle(data);
        });
        setInterval(upTime,1000);
    })(scope);
</script>
